```{python}
#| echo: false
import globalpaths
import pandas as pd
from IPython.display import display, Markdown
from IPython.display import display
```

This website displays the major results from the travel demand model steps.

## Control Center
```{python}
#| echo: false
df = pd.DataFrame(
    [('Description'        , globalpaths.Description ),
     ('Model Version'      , globalpaths.ModelVersion),
     ('Run ID'             , globalpaths.RID         ),
     ('Parent Directory'   , globalpaths.ParentDir   ),
     ('Scenario Directory' , globalpaths.ScenarioDir ),
     ('Master Prefix'      , globalpaths.MasterPrefix)],
columns = ['Variable', 'Value']).reset_index(drop=True)

markdown_df = df.to_markdown(index=False)
display(Markdown(markdown_df))
```

## General Parameters
```{python}
#| echo: false
df = pd.DataFrame(
    [('Used Zones'    , globalpaths.UsedZones),
     ('Highway Nodes' , globalpaths.HwyNodes ),
     ('MC Calibration', globalpaths.calib    )],
columns = ['Variable', 'Value']).reset_index(drop=True)

markdown_df = df.to_markdown(index=False)

```
